Posts.Content: Mar 26, 2013 10:31PM Italflamingo wrote: Hi I haven't posted in months. I will be having a double mastectomy the last of April. I have one more chemo treatment of taxol next wk. I read your post and could relate. I've been pretty lucky haven't had too many side effects from the 7 doses of chemo so far. My eyelashes & brows are hanging in there. I'm nervous about sx & recovery especially with my 3 yr old daughter. So I will be taking that plunge too ;).
Posts.Title: April 2013 Mastectomy ldesim ashleigh

Posts.Content: Apr 7, 2013 11:03PM - edited Apr 7, 2013 11:04PM by Italflamingo Hi everyone I wanted to see how everyone is feeling either after surgery or anybody have the nerves with surgery coming up? I just finished my 2nd cycle of chemo, was told most likely will need more after surgery, then the adventures of radiation. any body else in my boat?
